attributes.action: Improve all train services in the UK.
attributes.background: Trains transport thousands of people to work and school every day. Yet for the past few years train services have been on the decline. Sign this petition to make the UK Government save our vital railway network.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what improvements to train services you'd like. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start new petitions asking the UK Parliament and Government to reduce rail fares or ensure that all trains are no more than five years old.
